content: Lifestyle General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 Jun 2019Is it harder to sell a used car if the COE is low?Need advise, trying to sell my used car1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Serene TohLevel 5. GeniusUpdated on 10 Jun 2019It won’t be harder to sell because of Low COE. It’ll be harder to sell at a higher price during low COE. 
I.e. if you can sell Low enough price. No reason why people won’t buy.1 comment0
